thread.title: Longtime Lumen Christi football coach Herb Brogan named 2016 Al Cotton Award winner
thread.title_full: Longtime Lumen Christi football coach Herb Brogan named 2016 Al Cotton Award winner

author: Tony Garcia | agarcia6@mlive.com
title: Longtime Lumen Christi football coach Herb Brogan named 2016 Al Cotton Award winner
text: Brogan, the modest, unassuming coach, who has more football state championships since he's been a head coach than the rest of the Jackson area combined, just doesn't like to operate as the center of attention.Despite his desire to fade into the background, Brogan was thrust into the limelight in one of the most horrific ways possible.
